        Compare two Date objects by its millisecond
        Parameters:
        field - allow SECOND, MINUTE, HOUR, DATE else MILLISECOND
        startDate -
        endDate -
        Returns:
        result >= 0: endDate >= startDate, negative: endDate < startDate

      • addOrSubtractDate

        public static java.util.Date addOrSubtractDate(java.util.Date date,
                                               int amount)
        Roll date by amount. Can be roll up or down by sign of amount such as rollDate(new Date() , 5) is 5 dates from now rollDate(new Date(), -3) is before 3 date from now
        Parameters:
        date -
        amount -
        Returns:
